question: Which movies were released in 2003?
cypher:
MATCH (m:Movie)
WHERE m.released = 2003
RETURN m.title
typeql: match $m isa movie, has released 2003, has title $t; fetch { "title": $t };

question: List all people who have produced a movie and acted in another.
